page.title: 09ALLESTREE:HOUSING
page.content: THE ALLESTREE PART OF THE BLOCK IS THE NORTHERN EXTREMITY OF A LARGE MIDDLE- CLASS PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATE BUILT IN THE 50'S AND 60'S.(SEE PHOTO B).TOTAL AREA COVERED INCLUDING ADJACENT AREAS NOT IN THE BLOCK IS 3-4 SQ KM. HOUSES ARE BUILT AT LOW DENSITY,LESS THAN 20 PER HECTARE IN SOME PARTS. HOUSES ARE OF ALL TYPES - DETACHED AND SEMI- DETACHED;ONE AND TWO STOREY. THE ROADS ARE LAID OUT ON AN ALMOST RANDOM PATTERN, WITH MANY CURVING AVENUES, CUL-DE-SACS,& CRESCENTS, WHICH DISCOURAGE THROUGH TRAFFIC. THE ENVIRONMENT IS ONE OF PLEASANT TREE- LINED ROADS WITH NEAT HOUSES. THE OLD VILLAGE OF ALLESTREE CONTAINS HOUSES OF MANY AGES,INCLUDING VICTORIAN AND 1930'S RIBBON DEVELOPMENT.70'S & 80'S HOUSING LIES EAST OF THE A6.
